html:
Adorama is offering the Canon EOS R3 for $3999 with a bunch of useful, and brand name accessories from Canon, SanDisk and Capture One. These added items are a $669 bonus. This is on top of the current $1000 instant rebate being offered by Canon USA.

The Canon EOS R3 is going to remain a higher-end shooting option for a long while yet. If you’re looking for an integrated grip camera body with speed to burn, the EOS R3 is still a great choice.

  • Canon EOS R3 Camera Body
  • Canon Mount Adapter EF- EOS R
  • Canon LP-E19 Battery
  • SanDisk Extreme PRO 256GB CFexpress Card
  • Capture One Pro 1-year Paid Subscription
  • Canon NS-EN110 Camera Strap

Purchase Options

  • Canon EOS R3 Bundle $3999 at Adorama

Overview

  • High Image Quality with a Back-illuminated Stacked 24.1 Megapixel Full-frame CMOS Sensor
  • DIGIC X Image Processor with an ISO range of 100-102400; Expandable to 204800
  • The First EOS Digital camera to feature Eye Control AF
  • 5.76-million-dot & 120fps blackout free EVF with quick response, as well as a Vari-Angle Touchscreen
  • Capable of recording 6K 60P RAW or 4K 120p 10-bit (uncropped) with Canon Log 3
  • Dual Card Slots for CFexpress and UHS-II SD Memory Cards
  • Next Generation Multi-Function Shoe plus Speedlite EL-1 synchronization
  • Enhanced Connectivity

Building on the success of the EOS R series of cameras and leveraging advancements in technology that have come along since, the EOS R3 combines some of the best of both the EOS R5 and EOS-1D X Mark III cameras to provide a robust, high-performance camera.

The EOS R3 is the first “3” series camera since the popular EOS-3 film camera launched in 1998.
